metadata.title: CVE-2024-34003 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In a shared hosting environment that has been misconfigured to allow accessto other users' content, a Moodle user with both access to restore workshopmodules and direct access to the web server outside of the Moodle webrootcould execute a local file include.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
